verses.verse: וַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD פָּקַ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> pa-Kad visited אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he אָמָ֑ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar; as he had said וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD לְשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> le-sa-Rah unto Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber. as he had spoken

וַתַּהַר֩ <S%H2029><s%> vat-ta-Har conceived וַתֵּ֨לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and bare שָׂרָ֧ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah For Sarah לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham בֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> ben a son לִזְקֻנָ֑יו <S%H2208><s%> liz-ku-Nav; in his old age לַמּוֹעֵ֕ד <S%H4150><s%> lam-mo-'Ed at the set time אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber had spoken אֹת֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> o-To for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of which God

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֶׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name בְּנ֧וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No of his son הַנּֽוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> han-no-lad- that was born ל֛וֹ lo אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom יָלְדָה־ <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah- bare לּ֥וֹ lo שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah unto him whom Sarah יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak. to him Isaac

וַיָּ֤מָל <S%H4135><s%> vai-Ya-mol circumcised אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁמֹנַ֖ת <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nat being eight יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; days כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah had commanded אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. as God

וְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> ve-'av-ra-Ham And Abraham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old מְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'At was an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years בְּהִוָּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> be-hiv-Va-led was born ל֔וֹ lo, אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. when his son

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said שָׂרָ֔ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah, And Sarah צְחֹ֕ק <S%H6712><s%> tze-Chok me to laugh עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah hath made לִ֖י li אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everyone הַשֹּׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> hash-sho-Me-a' [so that] all that hear יִֽצְחַק־ <S%H6711><s%> yitz-chak- will laugh לִֽי׃ Li.

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer, And she said מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who מִלֵּל֙ <S%H4448><s%> mil-Lel Who would have said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham הֵינִ֥יקָה <S%H3243><s%> hei-Ni-kah suck בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim should have given children שָׂרָ֑ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah; that Sarah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָלַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad-ti ;for I have born בֵ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> ven [him] a son לִזְקֻנָֽיו׃ <S%H2208><s%> liz-ku-Nav. in his old age

וַיִּגְדַּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> vai-yig-Dal grew הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led And the child וַיִּגָּמַ֑ל <S%H1580><s%> vai-yig-ga-Mal; and was weaned וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham and Abraham מִשְׁתֶּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> mish-Teh feast גָד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, a great בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom the [same] day הִגָּמֵ֥ל <S%H1580><s%> hig-ga-Mel was weaned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak. that Isaac

וַתֵּ֨רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re saw שָׂרָ֜ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah And Sarah אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הָגָ֧ר <S%H1904><s%> ha-Gar of Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Rit the Egyptian אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah which she had born לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham מְצַחֵֽק׃ <S%H6711><s%> me-tza-Chek. mocking

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer Wherefore she said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham גָּרֵ֛שׁ <S%H1644><s%> ga-Resh Cast out הָאָמָ֥ה <S%H519><s%> ha-'a-Mah this bondwoman הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנָ֑הּ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nah; and her son כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִירַשׁ֙ <S%H3423><s%> yi-Rash shall not be heir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- for the son הָאָמָ֣ה <S%H519><s%> ha-'a-Mah of this bondwoman הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni with my son עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak. [even] with Isaac

וַיֵּ֧רַע <S%H7489><s%> vai-Ye-ra' distressed הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var And the thing מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od was very בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei sight אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham; in Abraham's עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אוֹדֹ֥ת <S%H182><s%> o-Dot because בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. of his son

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not יֵרַ֤ע <S%H7489><s%> ye-Ra' be distressed בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha in thy sight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because הַנַּ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar because of the lad וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- because אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> 'a-ma-Te-cha, and because of thy bondwoman כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> kol all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> to-Mar hath said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah in all that Sarah שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' unto thee hearken בְּקֹלָ֑הּ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lah; unto her voice כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> ve-yitz-Chak, for in Isaac יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re be called לְךָ֖ le-Cha זָֽרַע׃ <S%H2233><s%> Za-ra'. shall thy seed

וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- And also of the son הָאָמָ֖ה <S%H519><s%> ha-'a-Mah of the bondwoman לְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy a nation אֲשִׂימֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7760><s%> 'a-si-Men-nu; will I make כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha because he [is] thy seed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem rose up early אַבְרָהָ֣ם׀ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham בַּבֹּ֡קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker in the morning וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-kach- and took לֶחֶם֩ <S%H3899><s%> le-Chem bread וְחֵ֨מַת <S%H2573><s%> ve-Che-mat and a bottle מַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim of water וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and gave אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֠גָר <S%H1904><s%> Ha-gor [it] unto Hagar שָׂ֧ם <S%H7760><s%> sam putting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שִׁכְמָ֛הּ <S%H7926><s%> shich-Mah [it] on her shoulder וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led and the child וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֑הָ <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Che-ha; and sent her away וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech departed וַתֵּ֔תַע <S%H8582><s%> vat-Te-ta', and wandered בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness בְּאֵ֥ר be-'Er שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> Sha-va'. of Beersheba

וַיִּכְל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> vai-yich-Lu was spent הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim And the water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- in הַחֵ֑מֶת <S%H2573><s%> ha-Che-met; the bottle וַתַּשְׁלֵ֣ךְ <S%H7993><s%> vat-tash-Lech and she cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיֶּ֔לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led, the child תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad under one הַשִּׂיחִֽם׃ <S%H7880><s%> has-si-Chim. of the shrubs

וַתֵּלֶךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> vat-te-leCh went וַתֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vat-Te-shev and sat her down לָ֜הּ lah מִנֶּ֗גֶד <S%H5048><s%> min-Ne-ged, over against הַרְחֵק֙ <S%H7368><s%> har-Chek [him] a good way off כִּמְטַחֲוֵ֣י <S%H2909><s%> kim-ta-cha-Vei shot קֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ke-shet, arch כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָֽמְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Rah, for she said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not אֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> 'er-'Eh Let me not see בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> be-Mot the death הַיָּ֑לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ya-led; of the child וַתֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vat-Te-shev And she sat מִנֶּ֔גֶד <S%H5048><s%> min-Ne-ged, him וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-Sa over against [him] and lift up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֹלָ֖הּ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lah her voice וַתֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> vat-Te-vek. and wept

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard אֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice הַנַּעַר֒ <S%H5288><s%> han-na-'Ar of the lad וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach and the angel אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָגָר֙ <S%H1904><s%> ha-Gar to Hagar מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, out of heaven וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said לָ֖הּ lah מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- to her What לָּ֣ךְ lach הָגָ֑ר <S%H1904><s%> ha-Gar; to Hagar אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> tir-'I, affright כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שָׁמַ֧ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' hath heard אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him not for God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar of the lad בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ba-'a-Sher after הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. in it

ק֚וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Ku-mi Arise שְׂאִ֣י <S%H5375><s%> se-'I lift up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar, the lad וְהַחֲזִ֥יקִי <S%H2388><s%> ve-ha-cha-Zi-ki and hold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדֵ֖ךְ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dech him in thine hand בּ֑וֹ bo; כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol him a great אֲשִׂימֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H7760><s%> 'a-si-Men-nu. for I will make

וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <S%H6491><s%> vai-yif-Kach opened אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינֶ֔יהָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-ha, her eyes וַתֵּ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re and she saw בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> be-'Er a well מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of water וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech went וַתְּמַלֵּ֤א <S%H4390><s%> vat-te-mal-Le and filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֵ֙מֶת֙ <S%H2573><s%> ha-Che-met the bottle מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, with water וַתַּ֖שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> vat-Tashk drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar. the lad
